snippet.textDisplay: I tried to play this about  a year ago, and sadly, it was just waaaaayyyy to outdated for me. The main problem for me was the AI behind the girl - for the most part she would just run around in circles, and trying to get her from point A to point B was a pain even if it was a straight line between them. And since the "main objective" of the game (in the lack of better term) was to protect her, it ruined the game completely for me, as I just hated that compilation óf ones and zeros.
snippet.textOriginal: I tried to play this about  a year ago, and sadly, it was just waaaaayyyy to outdated for me. The main problem for me was the AI behind the girl - for the most part she would just run around in circles, and trying to get her from point A to point B was a pain even if it was a straight line between them. And since the "main objective" of the game (in the lack of better term) was to protect her, it ruined the game completely for me, as I just hated that compilation óf ones and zeros.

snippet.textDisplay: "Powerful" doesn't the impact this song causes on you when you've played this game all the way through. I've heard it two or three times before buying and finally playing the game, and still, it made me cry!. A game with such a single gameplay and controls, yet such power, such message, SUCH FEELINGS!, now THAT'S an excellent game... I still wanna cry just from hearing the song while I remember the ending sequence *sob*...
snippet.textOriginal: "Powerful" doesn't the impact this song causes on you when you've played this game all the way through. I've heard it two or three times before buying and finally playing the game, and still, it made me cry!. A game with such a single gameplay and controls, yet such power, such message, SUCH FEELINGS!, now THAT'S an excellent game... I still wanna cry just from hearing the song while I remember the ending sequence *sob*...

snippet.textDisplay: Team Ico is the creators name right? well their games are like a movie experience.. I mean, through the storyline, even if there doesn't have to be much cutscenes you feel grown to the characters and they always have an ending that makes u express how you've grown to the game. it makes me excited about The Last Guardian, that game looks great! I kinda feel like it'll have a sad ending thought with how Team Ico's games end though :( Why does the creature have to be so cute!
snippet.textOriginal: Team Ico is the creators name right? well their games are like a movie experience.. I mean, through the storyline, even if there doesn't have to be much cutscenes you feel grown to the characters and they always have an ending that makes u express how you've grown to the game. it makes me excited about The Last Guardian, that game looks great! I kinda feel like it'll have a sad ending thought with how Team Ico's games end though :( Why does the creature have to be so cute!

snippet.textDisplay: You should definitely get an eBay account and use PayPal... it's very safe and you're depriving yourself of a great game!!  It's not hard.
